Texts.Chs:
他们已经赢得了商人的声誉，因为他们乘坐巨大的方舟飞船在宇宙中游荡，这构成了他们社会的核心。这些太空啮齿动物精通经济和探索。

  ^orange;食性^reset;: 杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% 速度
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^cyan;15^reset;% 电系抗性, +^cyan;10^reset;% 辐射 & 寒气抗性, +^cyan;7^reset;% 精神抗性
  优秀商人: +^green;25^reset;% 魅力, +1000 初始现金
  +^green;72^reset; 饱腹度

^orange;武器^reset;:
  从可靠的随身武器开始
  能量武器精通: +^green;15^reset;%
  打击者精通: +^green;15^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% 毒素抗性, -^red;10^reset;% 火炎抗性, -^red;5^reset;%物理抗性
Texts.Eng:
They've earned a reputation as traders as they wander through the cosmos on gigantic Ark ships that form the core of their society. These space rodents are well-versed in economics and exploration.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;15^reset;% Electric, +^cyan;10^reset;% Radioactive & Ice, +^cyan;7^reset;% Mental
  Great Traders: +^green;25^reset;% Charisma, +1000 Start Cash
  +^green;72^reset; Max Food

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Start with reliable sidearm
  Energy Weapon Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%
  Striker Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Poison, -^red;10^reset;% Fire, -^red;5^reset;%Physical
